programme.desc: Local, regional and national Maori and international news from the Maori Television team of reporters. (Maori language with English language subtitles) (REPEAT)

programme.title: Maori Television
programme.desc: Maori Television specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more. Go to www.maoritelevision.com for more...

programme.title: Father Ted
